title: polarization_alterant
description: An object describing a single polarization altering element or an assembly that was used to produce illumination with desired polarization properties.

name.title: name
name.description: Short name of an element used for alteration of illumination light polarization state. As a text/string.

model.title: model
model.description: Model name of the polarization altering element given by manufacturer. As a text/string.

manufacturer.title: manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Manufacturer of the polarization altering element as a text/string.

material.title: material
material.description: Field describing the material from which polarization altering element was produced as a text/string.

type.title: type
type.description: Type of the polarization altering element. For example, "linear polarizer", "quater-wave plate", "half-wave plate", "retarder", "depolarizer" etc. As a text/string.

extinction_ratio.title: extinction_ratio
extinction_ratio.description: The field to describe typical extinction ratio of polarizer used for altering polarization of illumination. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the polarizer's extinction ratio as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Polarizer's extinction ratio is unitless and unit property should be filled with empty string "".

wl_range.title: wl_range
wl_range.description: Wavelength range within which polarization altering element is designed to be operated.

min_value.title: min_value
min_value.description: Numerical value of shortest wavelength at which polarization altering element can be used as a number or numerical string.

max_value.title: max_value
max_value.description: Numerical value of the longest wavelength at which polarization altering element can be used as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the shortest and longest wavelengths at which polarization altering element can be used as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

design_wl.title: design_wl
design_wl.description: An object describing wavelength at which polarization altering element is most effective by design.

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the wavelength at which polarization altering element is most effective as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the wavelength at which polarization altering element is most effective as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

damage_treshold.title: damage_treshold
damage_treshold.description: The field describing maximum power at which polarization altering element can be operated. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the maximum power at which polarization altering element can be operated as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the maximum optical power at which polarization altering element can be operated as a string that can have values "pW", "nW", "μW", "mW", "W", "kW", "MW" or "GW".
